game.ai.shared.rules.specification

Interface IParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandParser

    public interface IParser
    This is an interface that defines methods to compile the text file imported by the user
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IChain parse(java.lang.String fileName) 
      ICommand parseString(java.lang.String line)
      Verify the command structure and command semantic

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        IChain parse(java.lang.String fileName)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        fileName - - File that defines a list of rule following the format of rules.properties
        If there is any wrong format rule, the system will ignore and work with the next one
        If all ICommand defined in file are wrong, throw IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:
        CommandChain
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - An exception will be thrown if file is empty or does not exist or the rule definition is incorrect.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
